thread.title: Nikkei tumbles to fresh 7-month low as yen strengthens further
thread.title_full: Nikkei tumbles to fresh 7-month low as yen strengthens further

author: The Sydney Morning Herald
title: Nikkei tumbles to fresh 7-month low as yen strengthens further
text:
The Nikkei was down 3.2 per cent in the early afternoon at its lowest level since February 10. Photo: Bloomberg
Japan's Nikkei share average hit a fresh seven-month low, extending its losses from early trade as the yen rose further against the dollar while investors stayed risk-averse before the release of a key US jobs report later on Friday.
The Nikkei was down 3.2 per cent at 17,608.17 in early afternoon trade, its lowest level since February 10.
The broader Topix dropped 3.0 per cent to 1431.29 and the JPX-Nikkei Index 400 declined 3.1 per cent to 12,833.90.
Reuters
